SiteHistory.name: SiteHistory
SiteHistory.description: Represents the history of changes to the values in the fields of a site.

DataType.description: Data type of the field that was changed.

Field.description: The name of the field that was changed.

NewValue.description: The new value of the field that was changed.

OldValue.description: The last value of the field before it was changed.

SiteId.description: The ID of the associated Site.

SiteHistory.accessRules: Customer Portal users can't access this object. To view this object, you must have the “View Setup and Configuration” permission.
